summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.7°C) and feels like temperature (down 1.7°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 23%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 14254 lux), cloud levels (up 750 m), and pressure (up 7 mbar).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), light levels (up 12464 lux), cloud levels (up 429 m), and outside temperature (up 2.5°C) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 750.1m lower than yesterday, 428.6m lower than past week, 369.5m lower than past month.

The cloud levels measurements for yesterday ranged from 397m to 2140m and averaged 517.3m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: Low clouds are expected, possibly some fog or persistent clouds.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky and gentle light winds are expected. Showers, low clouds are expected, possibly some fog or persistent clouds, and a mix of sun and clouds. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
